summary: The Contoso Wireless phone is a powerful device with a quad-core processor, long-lasting battery life, and quick charging technology. It comes with a charger, USB cable, and earbuds, and features a 5.5 inch HD display, dual rear cameras, an advanced fingerprint scanner, facial recognition technology, an AI-powered assistant, expandable storage, and compatibility with most wireless networks. The phone is priced at $499.99 USD and comes with a one year limited warranty against defects in materials or workmanship from the date of purchase. Financing options are also available.
